Method.name: TestBasic
Method.Implementation:
Set Template = "{}{}{}" Set Result = ##class(Strix.Lib.String).TemplateReplace(Template, "a", "b", "c") Do ..AssertEqual(Result, "abc", "Basic sequential replacement.")
Set Template = "{3}{2}{1}" Set Result = ##class(Strix.Lib.String).TemplateReplace(Template, "a", "b", "c") Do ..AssertEqual(Result, "cba", "Basic reversed replacement.")
Quit
